titles.title: A bill to enlarge the San Francisco Bay National Wildlife Refuge.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 8/10/1988--Introduced. Amends Federal law establishing the San Francisco Bay National Wildlife Refuge to adjust the boundaries of such refuge to include specified additional lands, marshes, tidal flats, salt ponds, submerged lands, and open waters in the San Francisco Bay area. Provides that such lands, waters, and interests may only be acquired from willing sellers and donors. Authorizes appropriations.
